      • getChar

        public char getChar(String key)
        Returns the specified char from the language file. As these are typically used for mnemnoics the 'null' char is returned if the key is not defined
        Parameters:
        key -
        Returns:

      • setLocale

        public void setLocale(Locale locale)
        Sets the current locale to the given one and gets a resource bundle for new locale.

        The call to this method has no effect if the given locale is the same as the current one.

        Parameters:
        locale - the new locale
        See Also:
        ResourceBundle.getBundle(String, Locale)
